text: National Yang-Ming University (NYMU; ) is a university in Taiwan. It was named after the Chinese philosopher Wang Yangming. The main campus is in Taipei City. It was founded in 1975. NYMU is one of the four universities of the University System of Taiwan. ==Other websites== *NYMU Category:1975 establishments in Asia Category:Colleges and universities in Taipei Category:20th-century establishments in Taiwan
title: National Yang-Ming University
